Package org.sd.cluster.config

Interface Summary
Clusterable Interface for clusterable objects.
ClusterContext Cluster context.
 

Class Summary
Admin Administrative class for performing cluster functions like deploy, start, stop.
BooleanResponse A message that contains a boolean.
ClusterDefinition Class to encapsulate a cluster definition.
ClusterLogVisitor A log visitor for cluster logs.
ClusterNode Class to encapsulate a cluster node.
ClusterRollingLuceneStore A RollingLuceneStore in the cluster environment.
ClusterRunner Utility to run classes within the cluster.
Config Configuration for the cluster.
ConfigGenerator Utility to create a cluster definition configuration file.
ConfigGenerator.Bundle  
ConfigUtil General static utilties for config.
Console Console for interacting with a cluster.
DataPusher Utility class to push or spray data from one node to others.
IntegerResponse A message that contains a string.
JobAdmin Utility to send job commands to the cluster.
Ping A message to determine whether a cluster node is up.
PublishableCollectionResponse A signed response that holds a publishable object.
PublishableResponse A signed response that holds a publishable object.
RunningCsv Class to manage the running.csv file.
ShutdownMessage A message to tell a ClusterNode to shutdown.
SignedResponse A response that identifies the server that is responding.
StringResponse A message that contains a string.
UsersCsv Class to manage the users.csv file.
 

Exception Summary
ClusterException A top-level class for identifying cluster exceptions.
NonexistentNodeException A cluster exception thrown when a node is referenced that is not a part of the current cluster.
UnreachableNodeException A cluster exception thrown when a valid cluster node cannot be reached.
UnresponsiveNodeException A cluster exception thrown when a valid, running node does not respond to a message.
